description: Deletes the specified credential in the specified database

database_name.description: The name of the database containing the credential.

credential_name.description: The name of the credential to delete

parameters.description: The parameters to delete a credential if the current user is not the account owner.

cascade.description: Indicates if the delete should be a cascading delete (which deletes all resources dependent on the credential as well as the credential) or not. If false will fail if there are any resources relying on the credential.

password.description: the current password for the credential and user with access to the data source. This is required if the requester is not the account owner.
